CircusOfPlates
Class Player

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      CircusOfPlates.Player

public class Player
extends java.util.Observable

The Player class handles all the operations supported by a player it also contains the player internal data managed by creators of the player

Since:
JDK 1.6
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mostafa Mahmod Mahmod Eweda
See Also:
Stack
